question: A capacitor of capacitance 5 <katex>$\mu$</katex>F is charged by a battery of emf 10 V. At an instant of time, the potential difference across the capacitor is 4 V and the time rate of change of potential difference across the capacitor is <katex>$0.6 \text{ Vs}^{-1}$</katex>. Then the time rate at which energy is stored in the capacitor at that instant is
